page.title: 02THE WORSLEY AREA
page.content: THE WORSLEY AREA {BY S.M.WILLIAMSON The area centres around the town of Walkden,a route centre with links to Boothstown,Worsley,Swinton,Farnworth and Little Hulton locally and to Bolton,Wigan and Manchester further afield.Housing development has been rapid in the last 30 years;new building is still to come in the south_west but to the east is the newly_designated green_belt.Crossing Clifton Moss here is the Worsley Braided Interchange,the busiest,most extensive network in the country.Greater Manchester Council are developing this area for recreation with the golf course,footpaths through farm and woodland and the making safe of old tips,pit shafts and reservoirs.Industry,concentrated atHill Top,Linnyshaw and Little Hulton is convenient for the workforce.
